content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_door
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 10}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 58, "index": 17}, {"type": "cracked_nether_bricks", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "pufferfish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 23, "index": 24}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 40, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 23, "index": 29}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 40, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 53, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 25, "index": 42}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a crimson door, I need to craft 4 crimson planks and place them in a 2x3 grid on the crafting table. To craft 4 crimson planks, I need to craft a crimson stem, which I have in slot 38. Therefore I will move the crimson stem to the crafting table at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a crimson door, I need to first craft crimson planks. I have 4 crimson planks already, but I need 6, so I will need to craft 2 more. The only way to do this is to craft them from a crimson stem, which I have 1 of in my inventory at slot 38. Therefore, I will move the crimson stem to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
